title: Textile
medium: Technique: machine woven in plain weave
inscribed: Trude Guermonprez business card attached to lower corner with hand written,"Dress fabric, machine, 'Fabrics Intern'"
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 186 x 112 cm (6 ft. 1 1/4 in. x 44 1/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Plain weave with short intervals of two warps and wefts in a longer span of plain weave, tan and off-white warps with tan and black wefts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.
Technique: machine woven in plain weave. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-32.
